titleStmt.title: Eighteene reasons propounded to the soldiers of the body of the Army, why they ought to continue the several adjutators of their respective regiments, troopes, and companies, for the good of the Army, Parliament and Kingdome.
titleStmt.author: Overton, Richard, fl. 1646.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Newgate August 13. 1647. Richard Overton.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
